00096 DocumentImporter::DocumentImporter(bContext *C, const char *filename) :
00097     mImportStage(General),
00098     mFilename(filename),
00099     mContext(C),
00100     armature_importer(&unit_converter, &mesh_importer, &anim_importer, CTX_data_scene(C)),
00101     mesh_importer(&unit_converter, &armature_importer, CTX_data_scene(C)),
00102     anim_importer(&unit_converter, &armature_importer, CTX_data_scene(C))
00103 {}
00104 
00105 DocumentImporter::~DocumentImporter()
00106 {
00107     TagsMap::iterator etit;
00108     etit = uid_tags_map.begin();
00109     while(etit!=uid_tags_map.end()) {
00110         delete etit->second;
00111         etit++;
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool DocumentImporter::import()
00116 {
00117     ErrorHandler errorHandler;
00118     COLLADASaxFWL::Loader loader(&errorHandler);
00119     COLLADAFW::Root root(&loader, this);
00120     ExtraHandler *ehandler = new ExtraHandler(this, &(this->anim_importer));
00121     
00122     loader.registerExtraDataCallbackHandler(ehandler);
00123 
00124     if (!root.loadDocument(mFilename)) {
00125         fprintf(stderr, "COLLADAFW::Root::loadDocument() returned false on 1st pass\n");
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128     
00129     if (errorHandler.hasError())
00130         return false;
00131     
00134     mImportStage = Controller;
00135     
00136     COLLADASaxFWL::Loader loader2;
00137     COLLADAFW::Root root2(&loader2, this);
00138     
00139     if (!root2.loadDocument(mFilename)) {
00140         fprintf(stderr, "COLLADAFW::Root::loadDocument() returned false on 2nd pass\n");
00141         return false;
00142     }
00143     
00144     
00145     delete ehandler;
00146 
00147     return true;
00148 }

00162 void DocumentImporter::finish()
00163 {
00164     if (mImportStage!=General)
00165         return;
00166         
00168     std::vector<const COLLADAFW::VisualScene*>::iterator it;
00169     for (it = vscenes.begin(); it != vscenes.end(); it++) {
00170         PointerRNA sceneptr, unit_settings;
00171         PropertyRNA *system, *scale;
00172         // TODO: create a new scene except the selected <visual_scene> - use current blender scene for it
00173         Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(mContext);
00174         
00175         // for scene unit settings: system, scale_length
00176         RNA_id_pointer_create(&sce->id, &sceneptr);
00177         unit_settings = RNA_pointer_get(&sceneptr, "unit_settings");
00178         system = RNA_struct_find_property(&unit_settings, "system");
00179         scale = RNA_struct_find_property(&unit_settings, "scale_length");
00180         
00181         switch(unit_converter.isMetricSystem()) {
00182             case UnitConverter::Metric:
00183                 RNA_property_enum_set(&unit_settings, system, USER_UNIT_METRIC);
00184                 break;
00185             case UnitConverter::Imperial:
00186                 RNA_property_enum_set(&unit_settings, system, USER_UNIT_IMPERIAL);
00187                 break;
00188             default:
00189                 RNA_property_enum_set(&unit_settings, system, USER_UNIT_NONE);
00190                 break;
00191         }
00192         RNA_property_float_set(&unit_settings, scale, unit_converter.getLinearMeter());
00193         
00194         const COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray& roots = (*it)->getRootNodes();
00195 
00196         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < roots.getCount(); i++) {
00197             write_node(roots[i], NULL, sce, NULL, false);
00198         }
00199     }
00200     armature_importer.set_tags_map(this->uid_tags_map);
00201     armature_importer.make_armatures(mContext);
00202 
00203 #if 0
00204     armature_importer.fix_animation();
00205 #endif
00206 
00207     for (std::vector<const COLLADAFW::VisualScene*>::iterator it = vscenes.begin(); it != vscenes.end(); it++) {
00208         const COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray& roots = (*it)->getRootNodes();
00209 
00210         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < roots.getCount(); i++)
00211             translate_anim_recursive(roots[i],NULL,NULL);
00212     }
00213 
00214     if (libnode_ob.size()) {
00215         Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(mContext);
00216 
00217         fprintf(stderr, "got %d library nodes to free\n", (int)libnode_ob.size());
00218         // free all library_nodes
00219         std::vector<Object*>::iterator it;
00220         for (it = libnode_ob.begin(); it != libnode_ob.end(); it++) {
00221             Object *ob = *it;
00222 
00223             Base *base = object_in_scene(ob, sce);
00224             if (base) {
00225                 BLI_remlink(&sce->base, base);
00226                 free_libblock_us(&G.main->object, base->object);
00227                 if (sce->basact==base)
00228                     sce->basact= NULL;
00229                 MEM_freeN(base);
00230             }
00231         }
00232         libnode_ob.clear();
00233 
00234         DAG_scene_sort(CTX_data_main(mContext), sce);
00235         DAG_ids_flush_update(CTX_data_main(mContext), 0);
00236     }
00237 }

00240 void DocumentImporter::translate_anim_recursive(COLLADAFW::Node *node, COLLADAFW::Node *par = NULL, Object *parob = NULL)
00241 {
00242 
00243     // The split in #29246, rootmap must point at actual root when
00244     // calculating bones in apply_curves_as_matrix.
00245     // This has to do with inverse bind poses being world space
00246     // (the sources for skinned bones' restposes) and the way
00247     // non-skinning nodes have their "restpose" recursively calculated.
00248     // XXX TODO: design issue, how to support unrelated joints taking
00249     // part in skinning.
00250     if (par) { // && par->getType() == COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT) {
00251         // par is root if there's no corresp. key in root_map
00252         if (root_map.find(par->getUniqueId()) == root_map.end())
00253             root_map[node->getUniqueId()] = par;
00254         else
00255             root_map[node->getUniqueId()] = root_map[par->getUniqueId()];
00256     }
00257 
00258     /*COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType types[] = {
00259         COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE,
00260         COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE,
00261         COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE,
00262         COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX
00263     };
00264 
00265     Object *ob;*/
00266     unsigned int i;
00267 
00268     //for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00269         //ob = 
00270     anim_importer.translate_Animations(node, root_map, object_map, FW_object_map);
00271 
00272     COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray &children = node->getChildNodes();
00273     for (i = 0; i < children.getCount(); i++) {
00274         translate_anim_recursive(children[i], node, NULL);
00275     }
00276 }

00294 Object* DocumentImporter::create_camera_object(COLLADAFW::InstanceCamera *camera, Scene *sce)
00295 {
00296     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& cam_uid = camera->getInstanciatedObjectId();
00297     if (uid_camera_map.find(cam_uid) == uid_camera_map.end()) { 
00298         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't find camera by UID.\n");
00299         return NULL;
00300     }
00301     Object *ob = add_object(sce, OB_CAMERA);
00302     Camera *cam = uid_camera_map[cam_uid];
00303     Camera *old_cam = (Camera*)ob->data;
00304     ob->data = cam;
00305     old_cam->id.us--;
00306     if (old_cam->id.us == 0)
00307         free_libblock(&G.main->camera, old_cam);
00308     return ob;
00309 }
00310 
00311 Object* DocumentImporter::create_lamp_object(COLLADAFW::InstanceLight *lamp, Scene *sce)
00312 {
00313     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& lamp_uid = lamp->getInstanciatedObjectId();
00314     if (uid_lamp_map.find(lamp_uid) == uid_lamp_map.end()) {    
00315         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't find lamp by UID.\n");
00316         return NULL;
00317     }
00318     Object *ob = add_object(sce, OB_LAMP);
00319     Lamp *la = uid_lamp_map[lamp_uid];
00320     Lamp *old_lamp = (Lamp*)ob->data;
00321     ob->data = la;
00322     old_lamp->id.us--;
00323     if (old_lamp->id.us == 0)
00324         free_libblock(&G.main->lamp, old_lamp);
00325     return ob;
00326 }
00327 
00328 Object* DocumentImporter::create_instance_node(Object *source_ob, COLLADAFW::Node *source_node, COLLADAFW::Node *instance_node, Scene *sce, bool is_library_node)
00329 {
00330     fprintf(stderr, "create <instance_node> under node id=%s from node id=%s\n", instance_node ? instance_node->getOriginalId().c_str() : NULL, source_node ? source_node->getOriginalId().c_str() : NULL);
00331 
00332     Object *obn = copy_object(source_ob);
00333     obn->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00334     scene_add_base(sce, obn);
00335 
00336     if (instance_node) {
00337         anim_importer.read_node_transform(instance_node, obn);
00338         // if we also have a source_node (always ;), take its
00339         // transformation matrix and apply it to the newly instantiated
00340         // object to account for node hierarchy transforms in
00341         // .dae
00342         if (source_node) {
00343             COLLADABU::Math::Matrix4 mat4 = source_node->getTransformationMatrix();
00344             COLLADABU::Math::Matrix4 bmat4 = mat4.transpose(); // transpose to get blender row-major order
00345             float mat[4][4];
00346             for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00347                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
00348                     mat[i][j] = bmat4[i][j];
00349                 }
00350             }
00351             // calc new matrix and apply
00352             mult_m4_m4m4(obn->obmat, obn->obmat, mat);
00353             object_apply_mat4(obn, obn->obmat, 0, 0);
00354         }
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         anim_importer.read_node_transform(source_node, obn);
00358     }
00359 
00360     DAG_scene_sort(CTX_data_main(mContext), sce);
00361     DAG_ids_flush_update(CTX_data_main(mContext), 0);
00362 
00363     COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray &children = source_node->getChildNodes();
00364     if (children.getCount()) {
00365         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < children.getCount(); i++) {
00366             COLLADAFW::Node *child_node = children[i];
00367             const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& child_id = child_node->getUniqueId();
00368             if (object_map.find(child_id) == object_map.end())
00369                 continue;
00370             COLLADAFW::InstanceNodePointerArray &inodes = child_node->getInstanceNodes();
00371             Object *new_child = NULL;
00372             if (inodes.getCount()) { // \todo loop through instance nodes
00373                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& id = inodes[0]->getInstanciatedObjectId();
00374                 new_child = create_instance_node(object_map[id], node_map[id], child_node, sce, is_library_node);
00375             }
00376             else {
00377                 new_child = create_instance_node(object_map[child_id], child_node, NULL, sce, is_library_node);
00378             }
00379             bc_set_parent(new_child, obn, mContext, true);
00380 
00381             if (is_library_node)
00382                 libnode_ob.push_back(new_child);
00383         }
00384     }
00385 
00386     return obn;
00387 }
00388 
00389 void DocumentImporter::write_node (COLLADAFW::Node *node, COLLADAFW::Node *parent_node, Scene *sce, Object *par, bool is_library_node)
00390 {
00391     Object *ob = NULL;
00392     bool is_joint = node->getType() == COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT;
00393     bool read_transform = true;
00394 
00395     if (is_joint) {
00396         if ( par ) {
00397         Object * empty = par;
00398         par = add_object(sce, OB_ARMATURE);
00399         bc_set_parent(par,empty->parent, mContext);
00400         //remove empty : todo
00401         object_map[parent_node->getUniqueId()] = par;
00402         }
00403         armature_importer.add_joint(node, parent_node == NULL || parent_node->getType() != COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT, par, sce);
00404     }
00405     else {
00406         COLLADAFW::InstanceGeometryPointerArray &geom = node->getInstanceGeometries();
00407         COLLADAFW::InstanceCameraPointerArray &camera = node->getInstanceCameras();
00408         COLLADAFW::InstanceLightPointerArray &lamp = node->getInstanceLights();
00409         COLLADAFW::InstanceControllerPointerArray &controller = node->getInstanceControllers();
00410         COLLADAFW::InstanceNodePointerArray &inst_node = node->getInstanceNodes();
00411         size_t geom_done = 0;
00412         size_t camera_done = 0;
00413         size_t lamp_done = 0;
00414         size_t controller_done = 0;
00415         size_t inst_done = 0;
00416 
00417         // XXX linking object with the first <instance_geometry>, though a node may have more of them...
00418         // maybe join multiple <instance_...> meshes into 1, and link object with it? not sure...
00419         // <instance_geometry>
00420         while (geom_done < geom.getCount()) {
00421             ob = mesh_importer.create_mesh_object(node, geom[geom_done], false, uid_material_map,
00422                                                   material_texture_mapping_map);
00423             ++geom_done;
00424         }
00425         while (camera_done < camera.getCount()) {
00426             ob = create_camera_object(camera[camera_done], sce);
00427             ++camera_done;
00428         }
00429         while (lamp_done < lamp.getCount()) {
00430             ob = create_lamp_object(lamp[lamp_done], sce);
00431             ++lamp_done;
00432         }
00433         while (controller_done < controller.getCount()) {
00434             COLLADAFW::InstanceGeometry *geom = (COLLADAFW::InstanceGeometry*)controller[controller_done];
00435             ob = mesh_importer.create_mesh_object(node, geom, true, uid_material_map, material_texture_mapping_map);
00436             ++controller_done;
00437         }
00438         // XXX instance_node is not supported yet
00439         while (inst_done < inst_node.getCount()) {
00440             const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& node_id = inst_node[inst_done]->getInstanciatedObjectId();
00441             if (object_map.find(node_id) == object_map.end()) {
00442                 fprintf(stderr, "Cannot find object for node referenced by <instance_node name=\"%s\">.\n", inst_node[inst_done]->getName().c_str());
00443                 ob = NULL;
00444             }
00445             else {
00446                 Object *source_ob = object_map[node_id];
00447                 COLLADAFW::Node *source_node = node_map[node_id];
00448 
00449                 ob = create_instance_node(source_ob, source_node, node, sce, is_library_node);
00450             }
00451             ++inst_done;
00452 
00453             read_transform = false;
00454         }
00455         // if node is empty - create empty object
00456         // XXX empty node may not mean it is empty object, not sure about this
00457         if ( (geom_done + camera_done + lamp_done + controller_done + inst_done) < 1) {
00458             ob = add_object(sce, OB_EMPTY);
00459         }
00460         
00461         // XXX: if there're multiple instances, only one is stored
00462 
00463         if (!ob) return;
00464         
00465         std::string nodename = node->getName().size() ? node->getName() : node->getOriginalId();
00466         rename_id(&ob->id, (char*)nodename.c_str());
00467 
00468         object_map[node->getUniqueId()] = ob;
00469         node_map[node->getUniqueId()] = node;
00470 
00471         if (is_library_node)
00472             libnode_ob.push_back(ob);
00473     }
00474 
00475     if (read_transform)
00476         anim_importer.read_node_transform(node, ob); // overwrites location set earlier
00477 
00478     if (!is_joint) {
00479         // if par was given make this object child of the previous 
00480         if (par && ob)
00481             bc_set_parent(ob, par, mContext);
00482     }
00483 
00484     // if node has child nodes write them
00485     COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray &child_nodes = node->getChildNodes();
00486     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_nodes.getCount(); i++) { 
00487         write_node(child_nodes[i], node, sce, ob, is_library_node);
00488     }
00489 }
00490 
00493 bool DocumentImporter::writeVisualScene ( const COLLADAFW::VisualScene* visualScene ) 
00494 {
00495     if (mImportStage!=General)
00496         return true;
00497         
00498     // this method called on post process after writeGeometry, writeMaterial, etc.
00499 
00500     // for each <node> in <visual_scene>:
00501     // create an Object
00502     // if Mesh (previously created in writeGeometry) to which <node> corresponds exists, link Object with that mesh
00503 
00504     // update: since we cannot link a Mesh with Object in
00505     // writeGeometry because <geometry> does not reference <node>,
00506     // we link Objects with Meshes here
00507 
00508     vscenes.push_back(visualScene);
00509     
00510     return true;
00511 }
00512 
00516 bool DocumentImporter::writeLibraryNodes ( const COLLADAFW::LibraryNodes* libraryNodes ) 
00517 {
00518     if (mImportStage!=General)
00519         return true;
00520         
00521     Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(mContext);
00522 
00523     const COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray& nodes = libraryNodes->getNodes();
00524 
00525     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodes.getCount(); i++) {
00526         write_node(nodes[i], NULL, sce, NULL, true);
00527     }
00528 
00529     return true;
00530 }

00544 bool DocumentImporter::writeMaterial( const COLLADAFW::Material* cmat ) 
00545 {
00546     if (mImportStage!=General)
00547         return true;
00548         
00549     const std::string& str_mat_id = cmat->getName().size() ? cmat->getName() : cmat->getOriginalId();
00550     Material *ma = add_material((char*)str_mat_id.c_str());
00551     
00552     this->uid_effect_map[cmat->getInstantiatedEffect()] = ma;
00553     this->uid_material_map[cmat->getUniqueId()] = ma;
00554     
00555     return true;
00556 }
00557 
00558 // create mtex, create texture, set texture image
00559 MTex* DocumentImporter::create_texture(COLLADAFW::EffectCommon *ef, COLLADAFW::Texture &ctex, Material *ma,
00560                      int i, TexIndexTextureArrayMap &texindex_texarray_map)
00561 {
00562     COLLADAFW::SamplerPointerArray& samp_array = ef->getSamplerPointerArray();
00563     COLLADAFW::Sampler *sampler = samp_array[ctex.getSamplerId()];
00564         
00565     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& ima_uid = sampler->getSourceImage();
00566     
00567     if (uid_image_map.find(ima_uid) == uid_image_map.end()) {
00568         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't find an image by UID.\n");
00569         return NULL;
00570     }
00571     
00572     ma->mtex[i] = add_mtex();
00573     ma->mtex[i]->texco = TEXCO_UV;
00574     ma->mtex[i]->tex = add_texture("Texture");
00575     ma->mtex[i]->tex->type = TEX_IMAGE;
00576     ma->mtex[i]->tex->imaflag &= ~TEX_USEALPHA;
00577     ma->mtex[i]->tex->ima = uid_image_map[ima_uid];
00578     
00579     texindex_texarray_map[ctex.getTextureMapId()].push_back(ma->mtex[i]);
00580     
00581     return ma->mtex[i];
00582 }
00583 
00584 void DocumentImporter::write_profile_COMMON(COLLADAFW::EffectCommon *ef, Material *ma)
00585 {
00586     COLLADAFW::EffectCommon::ShaderType shader = ef->getShaderType();
00587     
00588     // blinn
00589     if (shader == COLLADAFW::EffectCommon::SHADER_BLINN) {
00590         ma->spec_shader = MA_SPEC_BLINN;
00591         ma->spec = ef->getShininess().getFloatValue();
00592     }
00593     // phong
00594     else if (shader == COLLADAFW::EffectCommon::SHADER_PHONG) {
00595         ma->spec_shader = MA_SPEC_PHONG;
00596         ma->har = ef->getShininess().getFloatValue();
00597     }
00598     // lambert
00599     else if (shader == COLLADAFW::EffectCommon::SHADER_LAMBERT) {
00600         ma->diff_shader = MA_DIFF_LAMBERT;
00601     }
00602     // default - lambert
00603     else {
00604         ma->diff_shader = MA_DIFF_LAMBERT;
00605         fprintf(stderr, "Current shader type is not supported, default to lambert.\n");
00606     }
00607     // reflectivity
00608     ma->ray_mirror = ef->getReflectivity().getFloatValue();
00609     // index of refraction
00610     ma->ang = ef->getIndexOfRefraction().getFloatValue();
00611     
00612     int i = 0;
00613     COLLADAFW::Color col;
00614     MTex *mtex = NULL;
00615     TexIndexTextureArrayMap texindex_texarray_map;
00616     
00617     // DIFFUSE
00618     // color
00619     if (ef->getDiffuse().isColor()) {
00620         col = ef->getDiffuse().getColor();
00621         ma->r = col.getRed();
00622         ma->g = col.getGreen();
00623         ma->b = col.getBlue();
00624     }
00625     // texture
00626     else if (ef->getDiffuse().isTexture()) {
00627         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getDiffuse().getTexture(); 
00628         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00629         if (mtex != NULL) {
00630             mtex->mapto = MAP_COL;
00631             ma->texact = (int)i;
00632             i++;
00633         }
00634     }
00635     // AMBIENT
00636     // color
00637     if (ef->getAmbient().isColor()) {
00638         col = ef->getAmbient().getColor();
00639         ma->ambr = col.getRed();
00640         ma->ambg = col.getGreen();
00641         ma->ambb = col.getBlue();
00642     }
00643     // texture
00644     else if (ef->getAmbient().isTexture()) {
00645         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getAmbient().getTexture(); 
00646         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00647         if (mtex != NULL) {
00648             mtex->mapto = MAP_AMB; 
00649             i++;
00650         }
00651     }
00652     // SPECULAR
00653     // color
00654     if (ef->getSpecular().isColor()) {
00655         col = ef->getSpecular().getColor();
00656         ma->specr = col.getRed();
00657         ma->specg = col.getGreen();
00658         ma->specb = col.getBlue();
00659     }
00660     // texture
00661     else if (ef->getSpecular().isTexture()) {
00662         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getSpecular().getTexture(); 
00663         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00664         if (mtex != NULL) {
00665             mtex->mapto = MAP_SPEC; 
00666             i++;
00667         }
00668     }
00669     // REFLECTIVE
00670     // color
00671     if (ef->getReflective().isColor()) {
00672         col = ef->getReflective().getColor();
00673         ma->mirr = col.getRed();
00674         ma->mirg = col.getGreen();
00675         ma->mirb = col.getBlue();
00676     }
00677     // texture
00678     else if (ef->getReflective().isTexture()) {
00679         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getReflective().getTexture(); 
00680         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00681         if (mtex != NULL) {
00682             mtex->mapto = MAP_REF; 
00683             i++;
00684         }
00685     }
00686     // EMISSION
00687     // color
00688     if (ef->getEmission().isColor()) {
00689         // XXX there is no emission color in blender
00690         // but I am not sure
00691     }
00692     // texture
00693     else if (ef->getEmission().isTexture()) {
00694         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getEmission().getTexture(); 
00695         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00696         if (mtex != NULL) {
00697             mtex->mapto = MAP_EMIT; 
00698             i++;
00699         }
00700     }
00701     
00702     if (ef->getOpacity().isTexture()) {
00703         COLLADAFW::Texture ctex = ef->getOpacity().getTexture();
00704         mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00705         if (mtex != NULL) {
00706             mtex->mapto = MAP_ALPHA;
00707             mtex->tex->imaflag |= TEX_USEALPHA;
00708             i++;
00709             ma->spectra = ma->alpha = 0;
00710             ma->mode |= MA_ZTRANSP|MA_TRANSP;
00711         }
00712     }
00713     // TRANSPARENT
00714     // color
00715 //  if (ef->getOpacity().isColor()) {
00716 //          // XXX don't know what to do here
00717 //      }
00718 //      // texture
00719 //      else if (ef->getOpacity().isTexture()) {
00720 //          ctex = ef->getOpacity().getTexture();
00721 //          if (mtex != NULL) mtex->mapto &= MAP_ALPHA;
00722 //          else {
00723 //              mtex = create_texture(ef, ctex, ma, i, texindex_texarray_map);
00724 //              if (mtex != NULL) mtex->mapto = MAP_ALPHA;
00725 //          }
00726 //      }
00727     material_texture_mapping_map[ma] = texindex_texarray_map;
00728 }
00729 
00733 bool DocumentImporter::writeEffect( const COLLADAFW::Effect* effect ) 
00734 {
00735     if (mImportStage!=General)
00736         return true;
00737     
00738     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& uid = effect->getUniqueId();
00739     
00740     if (uid_effect_map.find(uid) == uid_effect_map.end()) {
00741         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't find a material by UID.\n");
00742         return true;
00743     }
00744     
00745     Material *ma = uid_effect_map[uid];
00746     std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, Material*>::iterator  iter;
00747     for (iter = uid_material_map.begin(); iter != uid_material_map.end() ; iter++ )
00748     {
00749         if ( iter->second == ma ) {
00750             this->FW_object_map[iter->first] = effect;
00751             break;
00752         }
00753     }
00754     COLLADAFW::CommonEffectPointerArray common_efs = effect->getCommonEffects();
00755     if (common_efs.getCount() < 1) {
00756         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't find <profile_COMMON>.\n");
00757         return true;
00758     }
00759     // XXX TODO: Take all <profile_common>s
00760     // Currently only first <profile_common> is supported
00761     COLLADAFW::EffectCommon *ef = common_efs[0];
00762     write_profile_COMMON(ef, ma);
00763     this->FW_object_map[effect->getUniqueId()] = effect;
00764         
00765     return true;
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00771 bool DocumentImporter::writeCamera( const COLLADAFW::Camera* camera ) 
00772 {
00773     if (mImportStage!=General)
00774         return true;
00775         
00776     Camera *cam = NULL;
00777     std::string cam_id, cam_name;
00778     
00779     cam_id = camera->getOriginalId();
00780     cam_name = camera->getName();
00781     if (cam_name.size()) cam = (Camera*)add_camera((char*)cam_name.c_str());
00782     else cam = (Camera*)add_camera((char*)cam_id.c_str());
00783     
00784     if (!cam) {
00785         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot create camera.\n");
00786         return true;
00787     }
00788     cam->clipsta = camera->getNearClippingPlane().getValue();
00789     cam->clipend = camera->getFarClippingPlane().getValue();
00790     
00791     COLLADAFW::Camera::CameraType type = camera->getCameraType();
00792     switch(type) {
00793     case COLLADAFW::Camera::ORTHOGRAPHIC:
00794         {
00795             cam->type = CAM_ORTHO;
00796         }
00797         break;
00798     case COLLADAFW::Camera::PERSPECTIVE:
00799         {
00800             cam->type = CAM_PERSP;
00801         }
00802         break;
00803     case COLLADAFW::Camera::UNDEFINED_CAMERATYPE:
00804         {
00805             fprintf(stderr, "Current camera type is not supported.\n");
00806             cam->type = CAM_PERSP;
00807         }
00808         break;
00809     }
00810     
00811     switch(camera->getDescriptionType()) {
00812     case COLLADAFW::Camera::ASPECTRATIO_AND_Y:
00813         {
00814             switch(cam->type) {
00815                 case CAM_ORTHO:
00816                     {
00817                         double ymag = camera->getYMag().getValue();
00818                         double aspect = camera->getAspectRatio().getValue();
00819                         double xmag = aspect*ymag;
00820                         cam->ortho_scale = (float)xmag;
00821                     }
00822                     break;
00823                 case CAM_PERSP:
00824                 default:
00825                     {
00826                         double yfov = camera->getYFov().getValue();
00827                         double aspect = camera->getAspectRatio().getValue();
00828                         double xfov = aspect*yfov;
00829                         // xfov is in degrees, cam->lens is in millimiters
00830                         cam->lens = fov_to_focallength(DEG2RADF(xfov), cam->sensor_x);
00831                     }
00832                     break;
00833             }
00834         }
00835         break;
00836     /* XXX correct way to do following four is probably to get also render
00837        size and determine proper settings from that somehow */
00838     case COLLADAFW::Camera::ASPECTRATIO_AND_X:
00839     case COLLADAFW::Camera::SINGLE_X:
00840     case COLLADAFW::Camera::X_AND_Y:
00841         {
00842             switch(cam->type) {
00843                 case CAM_ORTHO:
00844                     cam->ortho_scale = (float)camera->getXMag().getValue();
00845                     break;
00846                 case CAM_PERSP:
00847                 default:
00848                     {
00849                         double x = camera->getXFov().getValue();
00850                         // x is in degrees, cam->lens is in millimiters
00851                         cam->lens = fov_to_focallength(DEG2RADF(x), cam->sensor_x);
00852                     }
00853                     break;
00854             }
00855         }
00856         break;
00857     case COLLADAFW::Camera::SINGLE_Y:
00858         {
00859             switch(cam->type) {
00860                 case CAM_ORTHO:
00861                     cam->ortho_scale = (float)camera->getYMag().getValue();
00862                     break;
00863                 case CAM_PERSP:
00864                 default:
00865                     {
00866                     double yfov = camera->getYFov().getValue();
00867                     // yfov is in degrees, cam->lens is in millimiters
00868                     cam->lens = fov_to_focallength(DEG2RADF(yfov), cam->sensor_x);
00869                     }
00870                     break;
00871             }
00872         }
00873         break;
00874     case COLLADAFW::Camera::UNDEFINED:
00875         // read nothing, use blender defaults.
00876         break;
00877     }
00878     
00879     this->uid_camera_map[camera->getUniqueId()] = cam;
00880     this->FW_object_map[camera->getUniqueId()] = camera;
00881     // XXX import camera options
00882     return true;
00883 }
00884 
00887 bool DocumentImporter::writeImage( const COLLADAFW::Image* image ) 
00888 {
00889     if (mImportStage!=General)
00890         return true;
00891         
00892     // XXX maybe it is necessary to check if the path is absolute or relative
00893     const std::string& filepath = image->getImageURI().toNativePath();
00894     const char *filename = (const char*)mFilename.c_str();
00895     char dir[FILE_MAX];
00896     char full_path[FILE_MAX];
00897     
00898     BLI_split_dir_part(filename, dir, sizeof(dir));
00899     BLI_join_dirfile(full_path, sizeof(full_path), dir, filepath.c_str());
00900     Image *ima = BKE_add_image_file(full_path);
00901     if (!ima) {
00902         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot create image.\n");
00903         return true;
00904     }
00905     this->uid_image_map[image->getUniqueId()] = ima;
00906     
00907     return true;
00908 }
00909 
00912 bool DocumentImporter::writeLight( const COLLADAFW::Light* light ) 
00913 {
00914     if (mImportStage!=General)
00915         return true;
00916 
00917     Lamp *lamp = NULL;
00918     std::string la_id, la_name;
00919 
00920     TagsMap::iterator etit;
00921     ExtraTags *et = 0;
00922     etit = uid_tags_map.find(light->getUniqueId().toAscii());
00923     if (etit != uid_tags_map.end())
00924         et = etit->second;
00925 
00926     la_id = light->getOriginalId();
00927     la_name = light->getName();
00928     if (la_name.size()) lamp = (Lamp*)add_lamp((char*)la_name.c_str());
00929     else lamp = (Lamp*)add_lamp((char*)la_id.c_str());
00930 
00931     if (!lamp) {
00932         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot create lamp.\n");
00933         return true;
00934     }
00935 
00936     // if we find an ExtraTags for this, use that instead.
00937     if (et && et->isProfile("blender")) {
00938         et->setData("type", &(lamp->type));
00939         et->setData("flag", &(lamp->flag));
00940         et->setData("mode", &(lamp->mode));
00941         et->setData("gamma", &(lamp->k));
00942         et->setData("red", &(lamp->r));
00943         et->setData("green", &(lamp->g));
00944         et->setData("blue", &(lamp->b));
00945         et->setData("shadow_r", &(lamp->shdwr));
00946         et->setData("shadow_g", &(lamp->shdwg));
00947         et->setData("shadow_b", &(lamp->shdwb));
00948         et->setData("energy", &(lamp->energy));
00949         et->setData("dist", &(lamp->dist));
00950         et->setData("spotsize", &(lamp->spotsize));
00951         et->setData("spotblend", &(lamp->spotblend));
00952         et->setData("halo_intensity", &(lamp->haint));
00953         et->setData("att1", &(lamp->att1));
00954         et->setData("att2", &(lamp->att2));
00955         et->setData("falloff_type", &(lamp->falloff_type));
00956         et->setData("clipsta", &(lamp->clipsta));
00957         et->setData("clipend", &(lamp->clipend));
00958         et->setData("shadspotsize", &(lamp->shadspotsize));
00959         et->setData("bias", &(lamp->bias));
00960         et->setData("soft", &(lamp->soft));
00961         et->setData("compressthresh", &(lamp->compressthresh));
00962         et->setData("bufsize", &(lamp->bufsize));
00963         et->setData("samp", &(lamp->samp));
00964         et->setData("buffers", &(lamp->buffers));
00965         et->setData("filtertype", &(lamp->filtertype));
00966         et->setData("bufflag", &(lamp->bufflag));
00967         et->setData("buftype", &(lamp->buftype));
00968         et->setData("ray_samp", &(lamp->ray_samp));
00969         et->setData("ray_sampy", &(lamp->ray_sampy));
00970         et->setData("ray_sampz", &(lamp->ray_sampz));
00971         et->setData("ray_samp_type", &(lamp->ray_samp_type));
00972         et->setData("area_shape", &(lamp->area_shape));
00973         et->setData("area_size", &(lamp->area_size));
00974         et->setData("area_sizey", &(lamp->area_sizey));
00975         et->setData("area_sizez", &(lamp->area_sizez));
00976         et->setData("adapt_thresh", &(lamp->adapt_thresh));
00977         et->setData("ray_samp_method", &(lamp->ray_samp_method));
00978         et->setData("shadhalostep", &(lamp->shadhalostep));
00979         et->setData("sun_effect_type", &(lamp->shadhalostep));
00980         et->setData("skyblendtype", &(lamp->skyblendtype));
00981         et->setData("horizon_brightness", &(lamp->horizon_brightness));
00982         et->setData("spread", &(lamp->spread));
00983         et->setData("sun_brightness", &(lamp->sun_brightness));
00984         et->setData("sun_size", &(lamp->sun_size));
00985         et->setData("backscattered_light", &(lamp->backscattered_light));
00986         et->setData("sun_intensity", &(lamp->sun_intensity));
00987         et->setData("atm_turbidity", &(lamp->atm_turbidity));
00988         et->setData("atm_extinction_factor", &(lamp->atm_extinction_factor));
00989         et->setData("atm_distance_factor", &(lamp->atm_distance_factor));
00990         et->setData("skyblendfac", &(lamp->skyblendfac));
00991         et->setData("sky_exposure", &(lamp->sky_exposure));
00992         et->setData("sky_colorspace", &(lamp->sky_colorspace));
00993     }
00994     else {
00995         float constatt = light->getConstantAttenuation().getValue();
00996         float linatt = light->getLinearAttenuation().getValue();
00997         float quadatt = light->getQuadraticAttenuation().getValue();
00998         float d = 25.0f;
00999         float att1 = 0.0f;
01000         float att2 = 0.0f;
01001         float e = 1.0f;
01002 
01003         if (light->getColor().isValid()) {
01004             COLLADAFW::Color col = light->getColor();
01005             lamp->r = col.getRed();
01006             lamp->g = col.getGreen();
01007             lamp->b = col.getBlue();
01008         }
01009 
01010         if (IS_EQ(linatt, 0.0f) && quadatt > 0.0f) {
01011             att2 = quadatt;
01012             d = sqrt(1.0f/quadatt);
01013         }
01014         // linear light
01015         else if (IS_EQ(quadatt, 0.0f) && linatt > 0.0f) {
01016             att1 = linatt;
01017             d = (1.0f/linatt);
01018         }
01019         else if (IS_EQ(constatt, 1.0f)) {
01020             att1 = 1.0f;
01021         }
01022         else {
01023             // assuming point light (const att = 1.0);
01024             att1 = 1.0f;
01025         }
01026         
01027         d *= ( 1.0f / unit_converter.getLinearMeter());
01028 
01029         lamp->energy = e;
01030         lamp->dist = d;
01031 
01032         COLLADAFW::Light::LightType type = light->getLightType();
01033         switch(type) {
01034             case COLLADAFW::Light::AMBIENT_LIGHT:
01035                 {
01036                     lamp->type = LA_HEMI;
01037                 }
01038                 break;
01039             case COLLADAFW::Light::SPOT_LIGHT:
01040                 {
01041                     lamp->type = LA_SPOT;
01042                     lamp->att1 = att1;
01043                     lamp->att2 = att2;
01044                     if (IS_EQ(att1, 0.0f) && att2 > 0)
01045                         lamp->falloff_type = LA_FALLOFF_INVSQUARE;
01046                     if (IS_EQ(att2, 0.0f) && att1 > 0)
01047                         lamp->falloff_type = LA_FALLOFF_INVLINEAR;
01048                     lamp->spotsize = light->getFallOffAngle().getValue();
01049                     lamp->spotblend = light->getFallOffExponent().getValue();
01050                 }
01051                 break;
01052             case COLLADAFW::Light::DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT:
01053                 {
01054                     /* our sun is very strong, so pick a smaller energy level */
01055                     lamp->type = LA_SUN;
01056                     lamp->mode |= LA_NO_SPEC;
01057                 }
01058                 break;
01059             case COLLADAFW::Light::POINT_LIGHT:
01060                 {
01061                     lamp->type = LA_LOCAL;
01062                     lamp->att1 = att1;
01063                     lamp->att2 = att2;
01064                     if (IS_EQ(att1, 0.0f) && att2 > 0)
01065                         lamp->falloff_type = LA_FALLOFF_INVSQUARE;
01066                     if (IS_EQ(att2, 0.0f) && att1 > 0)
01067                         lamp->falloff_type = LA_FALLOFF_INVLINEAR;
01068                 }
01069                 break;
01070             case COLLADAFW::Light::UNDEFINED:
01071                 {
01072                     fprintf(stderr, "Current lamp type is not supported.\n");
01073                     lamp->type = LA_LOCAL;
01074                 }
01075                 break;
01076         }
01077     }
01078 
01079     this->uid_lamp_map[light->getUniqueId()] = lamp;
01080     this->FW_object_map[light->getUniqueId()] = light;
01081     return true;
01082 }

01130 ExtraTags* DocumentImporter::getExtraTags(const COLLADAFW::UniqueId &uid)
01131 {
01132     if (uid_tags_map.find(uid.toAscii())==uid_tags_map.end()) {
01133         return NULL;
01134     }
01135     return uid_tags_map[uid.toAscii()];
01136 }
01137 
01138 bool DocumentImporter::addExtraTags( const COLLADAFW::UniqueId &uid, ExtraTags *extra_tags)
01139 {
01140     uid_tags_map[uid.toAscii()] = extra_tags;
01141     return true;
01142 }
